p:DataRuleFunctionsLibrary.name: Built in functions library
p:DataRuleFunctionsLibrary.description: Built in data quality rules functions and tests.

DataRuleFunction.name: coalesce
DataRuleFunction.description: Replace a missing value with a specific value

DataRuleFunction.displayName: Number of distinct values of %1 grouped by %2
DataRuleFunction.name: count
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, provides a count of the number of distinct values of a given column

DataRuleFunction.displayName: Number of non null values of %1 grouped by %2
DataRuleFunction.name: count_not_null
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, provides a count of the number of non null values of a given column

DataRuleFunction.name: dataclassesof
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the list of data classes matched by a value

DataRuleFunction.displayName: lookup %1 from reference key %2 and reference value %3
DataRuleFunction.name: lookup
DataRuleFunction.description: Replace a value with another value defined in a lookup table

DataRuleFunctions.DataRuleFunction:
Aggregate function, provides the number of occurrences of each value of a given column
%function.occurrences.param1.desc -->

DataRuleFunction.name: date
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the system date from the computer as a date value

DataRuleFunction.name: datevalue
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts the string representation of a date into a date value

DataRuleFunction.name: day
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a date, returns a number representing the day of the month for that date

DataRuleFunction.name: month
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a date, returns a number representing the month for that date

DataRuleFunction.name: round_date
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a rounded value of a date

DataRuleFunction.name: round_time
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a rounded value of a time

DataRuleFunction.name: round_timestamp
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a rounded value of a time

DataRuleFunction.name: trunc_date
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a truncated value of a date

DataRuleFunction.name: trunc_time
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a truncated value of a time

DataRuleFunction.name: trunc_timestamp
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a truncated value of a timestamp

DataRuleFunction.name: weekday
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a date, returns a number representing the day of week for that date, starting with 1 for Sunday

DataRuleFunction.name: year
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a date, returns a number representing the year for that date

DataRuleFunction.name: time
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the system time from the computer as a time value

DataRuleFunction.name: timevalue
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts the string representation of a time into a time value

DataRuleFunction.name: timestamp
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the system time from the computer as a timestamp value

DataRuleFunction.name: timestampvalue
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts the string representation of a timestamp into a timestamp value

DataRuleFunction.name: hours
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a time, returns a number representing the hours for that time

DataRuleFunction.name: minutes
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a time, returns a number representing the minutes for that time

DataRuleFunction.name: seconds
DataRuleFunction.description: Given a time, returns a number representing the seconds and milliseconds for that time

DataRuleFunction.displayName: number of days between dates %1 and %2
DataRuleFunction.name: datediff
DataRuleFunction.description: Determine the number of days difference between two dates

DataRuleFunction.name: timediff
DataRuleFunction.description: Determine the number of hours/minutes/seconds difference between two times

DataRuleFunction.name: addmonthstimestamp
DataRuleFunction.description: Adds the months to the TimeStamp specified

DataRuleFunction.name: addmonthsdate
DataRuleFunction.description: Adds the months to the Date specified

DataRuleFunction.name: abs
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the absolute value of a numeric value

DataRuleFunction.name: avg
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, returns the average value of a numeric column

DataRuleFunction.name: exp
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the exponential value of a numeric value

DataRuleFunction.name: max
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, returns the maximum value of a numeric column

DataRuleFunction.name: min
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, returns the minimum value of a numeric column

DataRuleFunction.name: round
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns a rounded value of a numeric value

DataRuleFunction.name: standardize
DataRuleFunction.description: Normalizes a numerical value based on the average value and standard deviation of all the other values of the same column. The formula used is: standardize(x)=(x-mean(x))/stddev(x)

DataRuleFunction.name: sqrt
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the square root value of a numeric value

DataRuleFunction.name: stddev
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, returns the standard deviation of all the values of a numeric column

DataRuleFunction.name: sum
DataRuleFunction.description: Aggregate function, returns the sum of all the values of a numeric column

DataRuleFunction.name: trunc
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the integer value obtained by truncating the decimal part of a numeric value

DataRuleFunction.name: ascii
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns ASCII character set value. Ex: ascii("C") returns 35

DataRuleFunction.name: char
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the CHAR value. This function is the opposite of ascii. Ex: char(35) returns 'C'

DataRuleFunction.displayName: replace all in string %1 instances of %2 with %3
DataRuleFunction.name: convert
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts a substring occurrence in a string to another. Ex: convert('hello', "ll', 'zz') returns 'hezzo'

DataRuleFunction.name: lcase
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts string to lower case

DataRuleFunction.name: index
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of a substring in another string. Returns the zero-based index of the occurrence if found, or -1 if the substring is not found

DataRuleFunction.name: left
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the first n characters of a string.

DataRuleFunction.name: len
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the number of characters in a string or the number of elements in a list

DataRuleFunction.name: ltrim
DataRuleFunction.description: Removes all blank spaces at the beginning of a string

DataRuleFunction.displayName: add %2 spaces before and %3 spaces after %1
DataRuleFunction.name: pad
DataRuleFunction.description: Add spaces at the beginning and the end of a string

DataRuleFunction.name: lpad
DataRuleFunction.description: Add spaces at the beginning of a string

DataRuleFunction.name: rpad
DataRuleFunction.description: Add spaces at the end of a string

DataRuleFunction.name: right
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the last n characters of a string.

DataRuleFunction.name: rtrim
DataRuleFunction.description: Removes all blank spaces at the end of a string

DataRuleFunction.displayName: substring of %1 beginning at position %2 and of length %3
DataRuleFunction.name: substring
DataRuleFunction.description: returns a substring of a string value. Ex: substring('hello',3, 2) returns 'll'

DataRuleFunction.name: str
DataRuleFunction.description: creates a string of N occurrences of a substring. Ex: str('z', 5) produces 'zzzzz'

DataRuleFunction.name: tostring
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts a value (number, time, date, etc...) to its string representation

DataRuleFunction.name: scale
DataRuleFunction.description: Returns the scale of the numeric/string value entered

DataRuleFunction.name: trim
DataRuleFunction.description: Removes all blank spaces at the beginning and at the end of a string

DataRuleFunction.name: ucase
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts string to upper case

DataRuleFunction.name: val
DataRuleFunction.description: Converts the string representation of a number into a numeric value

DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the 2 values are equals
Tests if the 2 values are different
Tests if the left value is greater than the right value
Tests if the left value is greater than or equals to the right value
Tests if the left value is less than the right value
Tests if the left value is less than or equals to the right value

DataRuleTest.name: contains
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left values contains the right value as a substring

DataRuleTest.name: exists
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left value exists (is not null)

DataRuleTest.name: in_reference_column
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left value exists in the reference column represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: in_reference_list
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left value exists in the list represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: is_date
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left string value can be parsed as a date by using the format indicated in the right value.

DataRuleTest.name: is_numeric
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left string value can be parsed as a number

DataRuleTest.name: matches_dataclass
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left value matches the data class whose class code is in the right value

DataRuleTest.name: matches_format
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left values has the format indicated in the right value

DataRuleTest.name: matches_regex
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left value matches the regular expression represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: occurs
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the number of occurrences of the left value in the whole column is exactly the number represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: occurs<=
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the number of occurrences of the left value in the whole column is at most the number represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: occurs<
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the number of occurrences of the left value in the whole column is less than the number represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: occurs>=
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the number of occurrences of the left value in the whole column is at least the number represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: occurs>
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the number of occurrences of the left value in the whole column is more than the number represented by the right value

DataRuleTest.name: unique
DataRuleTest.description: Tests if the left value is unique in its whole column
